amendment.description: Amendment requires the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress independent studies regarding potential cost savings with respect to the nuclear security enterprise and force structure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 441 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress independent studies regarding potential cost savings with respect to the nuclear security enterprise and force structure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A057) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 189 (Roll no. 471).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A057) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A057) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 189 (Roll no. 471).
